metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0124 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered affecting GitLab versions prior to 14.4.5,between 14.5.0 and 14.5.3, and between 14.6.0 and 14.6.1. Gitlab's Slackintegration is incorrectly validating user input and allows to craftmalicious URLs that are sent to slack.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
